page.title: 08Religion in Stock
page.content: We went to Greenwoods Stock to meet Reverend Russell Warden to go inside Christ Church Stock in the Church there is a small Platform with Carpet on it, lift that up and take away the boards and the beams to support it and there is a big round pool about 10 foot in Diameter and 5 foot deep with Spiral stairs going down this is for completely submerged Baptism. We went through a door in the church which lead to a Sunday School room where the children come for Sunday School half way through the Service. In the room is a passage going down to another room with french windows in it Through the windows you can see the Telephone Exchange,Stock Library used to be the old Exchange.When they were building the new one the Bulldozers dug up lots of{GRAVES}and split the {COFFINS}so they had to move the site.
